pr_title: [BEAM-10753] Add Slack link invitation on README

timeline.message:
[BEAM-10753] Add Slack link invitation on README

Using Slack for communication will be easier.
We also can find the link invitation on https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/INFRA/Slack+Guest+Invites
However, it's not directly listed on contact us, at least for now.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            * [Join ASF Slack](https://s.apache.org/slack-invite) on [#beam channel](https://app.slack.com/client/T4S1WH2J3/C9H0YNP3P)
          
          
            
            * [Join ASF Slack](https://s.apache.org/slack-invite) on [#beam channel](https://s.apache.org/beam-slack-channel)
timeline.author: lukecwik
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -93,6 +93,7 @@ To get involved in Apache Beam:
 
 * [Subscribe](mailto:user-subscribe@beam.apache.org) or [mail](mailto:user@beam.apache.org) the [user@beam.apache.org](http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/beam-user/) list.
 * [Subscribe](mailto:dev-subscribe@beam.apache.org) or [mail](mailto:dev@beam.apache.org) the [dev@beam.apache.org](http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/beam-dev/) list.
+* [Join ASF Slack](https://s.apache.org/slack-invite) on [#beam channel](https://app.slack.com/client/T4S1WH2J3/C9H0YNP3P)
